   92729, 92829, 92929, 93039, 93139, 93239, 93339, 93439, 93539, 
   93639, 93739, 93839, 93939, 94049, 94149, 94249, 94349, 94449,

   99099, 99199, 99299, 99399, 99499, 99599, 99699, 99799, 99899, 
   99999,100001
        
    };
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {   sum=0;
        scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
        for(i=0;;i++)
        {
            if(d[i]>=a&&d[i]<=b)
            sum+=d[i];
            if(d[i]>b)
            break;
        }
        printf("sum is %lld\n",sum);
    }
 
    return 0;
}
